description:
Clean water is important when disaster strikes. This home water filtration system attaches to most standard spigots and uses a two-stage filter to provide safe and taste-free water on demand. Add it to your emergency kit in case of compromised water systems, disasters or boil orders.

  • Fast-flow hollow fibre technology uses polymer fibres remove particulate and pathogens
  • Activated carbon reduces chemicals and tastes
  • Threaded adapter fits most spigots, sinks and water barrels
  • Packaging is hermetically sealed for safe, long-term storage
  • Nominal 1000L filter life is for clear water
name: MSR Emergency Home Water Filtration System
